item.title: 美国非农就业人数增加13万，失业率意外下降
item.description: 美国1月就业数据超出预期，失业率意外下降，表明年初劳动力市场持续趋稳。【原文：US hiring beat forecasts in January and the unemployment rate unexpectedly fell, suggesting the labor market continued to stabilize at the start of the year.】

item.title: 托马斯·布拉沃与Vista试图平息对人工智能威胁软件行业的担忧
item.description: 私募股权软件专家托马斯·布拉沃和维斯塔股权合伙公司正紧急向基金投资者保证其投资组合状况良好。此前因对人工智能颠覆性影响的担忧引发上周股市大范围抛售。【原文：Private equity software specialists Thoma Bravo and Vista Equity Partners are rushing to reassure fund investors that their portfolios are healthy after anxiety over artificial intelligence disruptions sparked a broad equity selloff last week.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚总统候选人欲致电国际货币基金组织寻求援助以摆脱财政困境
item.description: 哥伦比亚财政赤字如此严重，以至于需要国际货币基金组织制定计划来帮助其恢复控制，该国即将举行的总统选举中一位中间偏右的候选人如是说。【原文：Colombia’s fiscal hole is so deep that it warrants an International Monetary Fund program to get it back under control, according to a center-right candidate in the country’s upcoming presidential election.】

item.title: 可可贸易商暂停科特迪瓦采购以寻求更低价格
item.description: 据知情人士透露，在最大可可生产国科特迪瓦，可可贸易商正推迟采购即将收获的中季作物，因市场暴跌后他们寻求更低价格。【原文：Cocoa traders in top grower Ivory Coast are holding off buying beans that will be harvested from the upcoming mid-crop, as they seek lower prices following a market rout, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 德国联邦银行行长纳格尔呼吁建立欧盟共同债务，Politico报道
item.description: 德国联邦银行行长约阿希姆·纳格尔支持增加欧盟共同债务，以提升该地区对投资者的吸引力。【原文：Bundesbank President Joachim Nagel backed more joint European Union debt to increase the region’s appeal to investors.】

item.title: 第二家企业因爱泼斯坦档案暂停与迪拜环球港务集团的交易
item.description: 英国政府旗下拥有99亿英镑（136亿美元）资产的开发性金融机构英国国际投资公司，因港口运营商迪拜环球港务集团首席执行官与遭罢黜的金融家杰弗里·爱泼斯坦存在关联的指控，已暂停对该集团的投资。【原文：British International Investment, a £9.9 billion ($13.6 billion) development-finance institution owned by the UK government, halted investments with DP World over alleged ties between the port operator’s chief executive officer and disgraced financier Jeffrey Epstein.】

item.title: T-Mobile新增用户数低于预期，CEO面临考验
item.description: T-Mobile美国公司第四季度新增手机用户数低于分析师预期，凸显了新任首席执行官斯里尼·戈帕兰面临的挑战。【原文：T-Mobile US Inc. added fewer mobile-phone subscribers than analysts expected in the fourth quarter, highlighting the challenge ahead for new Chief Executive Officer Srini Gopalan.】

item.title: 尼日利亚开放官方美元市场予外汇兑换机构，以缩小奈拉街头汇率差距
item.description: 尼日利亚中央银行首次允许货币兑换机构在官方市场获取美元，旨在缓解零售市场美元短缺问题，并缩小奈拉官方汇率与黑市汇率之间的差距。【原文：The Central Bank of Nigeria has for the first time granted currency-exchange bureaux access to dollars at the official market, seeking to ease retail shortages and narrow the gap between the naira’s formal and street rates.】

item.title: Shopify股价盘前大涨，因营收超预期
item.description: Shopify公司第四季度业绩超出分析师预期，假日消费旺季推动营收增长。该公司股价在盘前交易中大幅上涨。【原文：Shopify Inc. beat analysts’ fourth-quarter estimates after strong holiday spending lifted revenues. The stock soared in premarket trading.】

item.title: 毕马威调查显示：2026年并购交易中剥离业务成焦点
item.description: 毕马威指出，随着地缘政治压力不断加剧以及人工智能带来的快速颠覆，董事会正致力于简化投资组合，预计2026年全球并购将以剥离业务为核心特征。【原文：Carve-outs are set to define global mergers and acquisitions in 2026 as boards simplify portfolios under mounting geopolitical pressures and fast-moving disruption from artificial intelligence, according to KPMG.】

item.title: 为何“充分就业”对美国经济而言远远不够
item.description: 特朗普政府对移民的严厉打压及其驱逐数万乃至数十万移民的举措，削弱了美国劳动力队伍的扩张。【原文：The Trump administration’s crackdown on immigration and its effort to eject thousands if not hundreds of thousands of migrants has undercut the expansion of the American labor force.】

item.description: 越来越多的证据表明，基层民众对特朗普关税政策的反对情绪正蔓延至部分共和党国会议员。【原文：Evidence is mounting that the grass roots opposition to Trump’s tariffs is reaching some GOP members of Congress】

item.title: Reckoner推出创新型CLO交易所交易基金，实现贷款股息再投资
item.description: Reckoner资本管理公司即将推出一系列抵押贷款支持证券ETF，这些产品将自动再投资贷款股息。这一创新功能将使投资者能够自主掌控分红收取与纳税时间。【原文：Reckoner Capital Management is launching a series of collateralized loan obligation ETFs that will automatically reinvest loan dividends, a novel feature that will allow investors to control when they collect distributions and pay taxes.】

item.title: 美元走弱对经济意味着什么
item.description: 美元通常在经济或地缘政治动荡时期走强，但2026年多数不确定性和政治动荡源自美国国内——而唐纳德·特朗普总统对美元由此引发的暴跌表示赞许。 过去一年间，美元兑一篮子全球货币整体下跌9%，1月份更跌至2022年3月以来的最低点。而这种下行压力似乎并未消退。【原文：The dollar typically strengthens in times of economic or geopolitical strife, but in 2026 much of the uncertainty and political turmoil is coming from inside the US – and President Donald Trump has given a thumbs-up to the resulting plunge in the greenback. The dollar has dropped 9% overall against a basket of world currencies over the last year, and in January fell to its weakest level since March 2022. And the downward pressures don’t appear to be going away.】

item.title: 阿尔诺在承诺持股超50%后大举增持LVMH股份
item.description: 法国亿万富豪伯纳德·阿诺特誓言将自己持有的奢侈品集团LVMH股份增持至控股地位的次日，便立即展开了收购行动。【原文：The day after French billionaire Bernard Arnault vowed to raise his stake in luxury conglomerate LVMH to majority ownership, he hunkered down and started buying.】

item.title: 加纳召开可可紧急内阁会议 因期货价格暴跌
item.description: 加纳总统——这个全球第二大可可生产国的领导人——已紧急召集内阁会议，因这种巧克力原料的国际价格正急剧下跌。【原文：The president of Ghana, the world’s second-largest producer of cocoa, has called an emergency cabinet meeting as international prices of the chocolate-making ingredient plunge.】

item.title: 恩智浦纠纷持续发酵，法院下令对芯片制造商展开调查
item.description: 荷兰法院下令对芯片制造商恩智浦半导体公司展开调查，此举加剧了这场法律纠纷——该纠纷已导致中国所有者胜华科技公司失去对该公司的控制权，并引发了跨行业的供应中断。【原文：A Dutch court ordered an investigation into chipmaker Nexperia BV, deepening a legal dispute that wrested control away from Chinese owner Wingtech Technology Co. and triggered supply disruptions across industries.】

item.title: Mistral向瑞典人工智能数据中心建设投资12亿欧元
item.description: 法国初创企业Mistral AI正斥资12亿欧元（约合14亿美元）在瑞典建设人工智能基础设施，力图成为欧洲政府和企业首选的人工智能供应商。【原文：French startup Mistral AI is investing €1.2 billion ($1.4 billion) to build AI infrastructure in Sweden, as it pushes to become the go-to artificial intelligence supplier for governments and enterprises in Europe.】

item.title: 欧洲财富管理类股因人工智能担忧遭抛售
item.description: 欧洲财富管理行业成为最新受到人工智能发展冲击的领域，一款新工具引发了业界部分业务将被自动化取代的担忧。【原文：European wealth management was the latest sector to be rattled by artificial intelligence developments, as a new tool spurred concern that parts of the industry will be automated.】

item.title: 印度称新CPI数据将更准确反映经济现实
item.description: 印度正采取重大举措，全面修订其关键统计数据，以更准确地反映过去十年间消费支出的迅猛增长，并提升这个全球增长最快的经济体之一的政策制定水平。【原文：India is taking major steps to overhaul its key statistics to better capture the rapid expansion in consumer spending over the past decade and improve policymaking in one of the world’s fastest-growing economies.】

item.title: 阿布扎比国家石油公司扩大液化天然气船队规模以推动全球贸易雄心
item.description: 阿布扎比国家石油公司旗下航运部门计划订购多达六艘液化天然气运输船，这家国有生产商正加速推进其全球天然气贸易布局。【原文：Abu Dhabi National Oil Co.’s shipping arm plans to order as many as six liquefied natural gas tankers as the state producer accelerates its push into global gas trading.】

item.title: 瑞士法郎需求异常旺盛，即便瑞士央行风险犹存
item.description: 投资者将瑞士法郎视为市场上最纯粹的避风港，在寻求美元替代品时，他们无视央行干预的威胁。【原文：Investors are treating the Swiss franc as the purest safe haven on the market, brushing off the threat of central bank intervention as they seek out alternatives to the US dollar.】

item.title: QXO公司拟以22.5亿美元收购科迪亚克建筑合伙公司
item.description: QXO公司同意以约22.5亿美元收购科迪亚克建筑合作伙伴公司，以将其建筑产品业务拓展至美国关键市场。【原文：QXO Inc. agreed to buy Kodiak Building Partners for about $2.25 billion to expand its construction products business into key markets in the US.】

item.title: 中国计划将电力贸易量提升至总消费量的70%
item.description: 中国计划将电力交易量提升至全国总用电量的70%，周三发布的政府声明详细阐述了2030年统一电力市场的战略规划。【原文：China plans to raise the share of electricity trade to 70% of the nation’s total consumption, according to a Wednesday statement detailing the government strategy for a 2030 unified power market.】
